title: Demonstration
text: We can put $$2$$ inside the absolute value, which is $$|2\left(x-1\right)|$$
speech: We can put  2  inside the absolute value, which is  the absolute value of 2 times, parentheses x minus 1, , end absolute value
pacedSpeech: inside the absolute value, which is   the absolute value of 2 times,  x minus 1, , end absolute value

title: Demonstration
speech: Two cases:  2 times, parentheses x minus 1,   if  x minus 1 is greater than or equal to 0  and  negative 2 times, parentheses x minus 1,   if  x minus 1 is less than 0
pacedSpeech: if   x minus 1 is greater than or equal to 0
if   x minus 1 is less than 0

title: Demonstration
speech: Simplify:  2 x minus 2  if  x is greater than or equal to 1  and  negative 2 times x plus 2  if  x is less than 1
pacedSpeech: if   x is greater than or equal to 1
